CREATE TABLE `wp_coupon_company` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `company_name` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `created_by` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `short_code` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `added_on` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`company_name`), UNIQUE KEY `id` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4
